subject: Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: Slava Kozlov scored twice, and Tobias Enstrom had the deciding goal with 8 minutes 31 seconds remaining to help the host Atlanta Thrashers beat the Islanders.
snippet: Slava Kozlov scored twice, and Tobias Enstrom had the deciding goal with 8 minutes 31 seconds remaining to help the host Atlanta Thrashers beat the Islanders.
